about.summary: Dimorphite-DL adds hydrogen atoms to molecular representations, as appropriate for a user-specified pH range. It is a fast, accurate, accessible, and modular open-source program for enumerating small-molecule ionization states.

Dimorphite-DL adds hydrogen atoms to molecular representations, as appropriate for a user-specified pH range. It is a fast, accurate, accessible, and modular open-source program for enumerating small-molecule ionization states.

name: dimorphite-dl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dimorphite-dl" %}
{% set version = "1.3.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/dimorphite_dl-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4c96065a21f59eed88227bec4538a9559a11c43c0e1875cfcd9004447989ea59

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - rdkit

test:
  imports:
    - dimorphite_dl
# `pip check` fails because of rdkit-pypi
#  commands:
#    - pip check
#  requires:
#    - pip

about:
  home: https://www.github.com/Sulstice/dimorphite_dl
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: |
    Dimorphite-DL adds hydrogen atoms to molecular representations, as appropriate for a user-specified pH range. It is a fast, accurate, accessible, and modular open-source program for enumerating small-molecule ionization states.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hadim
